mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Coon, James
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Upshur Co., VA [Upshur County, West Virginia]
French Creek, Upshur Co., VA [French Creek, Upshur County, West Virginia]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Coon, James Patient Age: 18. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture left arm lower third of humerus: Musket bullet entered about the elbow. Amputated 09/24 [1864] Doct. Barrett, field hospital. Location Wounded: Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/09/19. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Result: Transferred to USA Genl Hospital Grafton W VA 1865/01/24.
